para.emphasis: Mapping key combination for e4 AUTs

listitem.para: In some e4 AUTs, a key-binding clash may result in the shortcut for the Object Mapping Mode not working on certain components.
If you notice that you cannot map any / certain components, please alter the Object Mapping shortcut to an unused shortcut.

para.emphasis: Multi-window mode much slower on IE

listitem.para: The multi-window mode for HTML AUTs is considerably slower on IE than on Firefox.
This is a known issue that is registered at Selenium.
The embedded Chronon support for the standalone versions has been removed.
You can still configure your AUT to run with Chronon.
